full_threads.body:
Anytime tomorrow is great thanks




Natasha Dauner | Marketing & Graphic Design Manager

NICK'S RESTAURANT & BAR GROUP

D (02) 8281 1169 | M 0424 100 250 | T 1300 989 989

E Natasha@nicksgroup.com.au W www.nicksgroup.com.au

Hi Natasha, 

I will call you tomorrow to talk through these. Is there a good time?

Sorry I keep forwarding this to you but just Incase any of these issues are new and can be resolved?

Sent from my iPhone

Begin forwarded message:

> From: Nia Gitsas <nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au>>
> Date: February 25, 2019 at 12:03:19 PM GMT+10
> To: Natasha Dauner <natasha@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:natasha@nicksgroup.com.au>>
> Cc: Amanda Finnie <Amanda@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:Amanda@nicksgroup.com.au>>
> Subject: FW: 30th March 2019
>
> Hi Tash,
>
> Might want to chase them up in regards to the online payments. There seems to be an issue.
>
> Thank you.
>
> Kind regards,
> Nia Gitsas-Group Sales Executive
> NICK'S RESTAURANT & BAR GROUP

> Sent: Monday, 25 February 2019 7:08 AM
> To: Nia Gitsas <nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au>>
> Subject: Re: 30th March 2019
>
> Hi Nia,
> I am attempting to send payment via the deposit form but it's not going through. I got an error message about the date that I corrected, now I get one about inputting the correct credit card details. I used internet explorer as suggested on the site. I even used google chrome with the same results.
>
> Terri
>
>
>

>
> Hi Nia,
>
> Wanted to let you know that the deposit is in the process of being transferred from my PayPal account to my bank account. Once complete, I will complete your deposit form. The final number is 56.
>
> Thanks for all of your help. Hope to meet you at our dinner.
>
> Terri
>

> Subject: Re: 30th March 2019
>
> Hi Nia,
> I am in the process of finalizing the list now. Looking at approximately 50 people now.
>
> Terri
>
> On Monday, February 18, 2019, 2:40:11 PM PST, Nia Gitsas <nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au>> wrote:
>
>
> Hi Terri,
>
>
>
> Hope you are well. I just wanted to touch base with you in regards to your deposit for your booking on 30th March, as we have not received anything yet. A deposit is essential for final confirmation of your large group booking.
>
>
>
> You can complete the credit card authorisation/booking form attached at your earliest convenience.
>
> Ori f you would prefer, please process the payment online by following the link below (Visa/MasterCard accepted only), and using the reference code ____(LASTNAME DATEOFFUNCTION)____ making sure to specify Nick’s Seafood in Cockle Bay. Please also fill in the booking form, remembering to sign the bottom of the page to agree to the terms and conditions.
>
> https://www.nicks-seafood.com.au/deposits <https://www.nicks-seafood.com.au/deposits>
>
>
> Looking forward to hearing back from you.
>
> Thank you.
>
>
>
> Kind regards,
>
> Nia Gitsas-Group Sales Executive
>
> NICK'S RESTAURANT & BAR GROUP
>
> D (02) 8281 1175 <tel:(02)%208281%201175> F (02) 9261 5810 <tel:(02)%209261%205810> M 0406 256 451 <tel:0406%20256%20451> T 1300 989 989 <tel:1300%20989%20989>
>
> E nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au> W www.nicksgroup.com.au <http://www.nicksgroup.com.au/>

> From: Terri Scott <tls433@yahoo.com <mailto:tls433@yahoo.com>>
> Sent: Saturday, 26 January 2019 5:48 AM
> To: Nia Gitsas <nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au>>
> Subject: Re: menu
>
>
>
> Hello Nia,
>
> Want to give you an update on our DK pre-cruise dinner on Saturday, March 30. I have set up a paypal account for the deposits with a Feb. 15th deadline date. I am keeping a list of all payees which will be the final headcount - will you need a copy of the list? Regarding dietary needs, so far only one person responded that she is a vegan and I don’t think there are any kids. We are looking forward to our dinner at Nicks.
>
>
>
> Thanks,
>
> Terri
>
>
>
> On Thursday, January 17, 2019, 2:42:19 PM PST, Nia Gitsas <nia@nicksgroup.com.au <mailto:nia@nicksgroup.com.au>> wrote:
>
>
>
>
>
> Hi Terri,
>
>
>
>
>
> We are really excited to welcome your group to Nick’s Restaurant and Bar Group in March. Please see below menu Sheryl has chosen for Nick’s Seafood. Stephanie is our Functions Coordinator at Nick’s Seafood who will be looking after you. As I mentioned to my previous email, to secure your booking a deposit is required and full food prepayment is required 5 days prior to your booking as numbers need to be finalised. Will kids be included in your group? If so, we also have kids menus available and we can cater for all dietary requirements.
>
> We can issue an invoice for you and you can make an EFT payment or if you would prefer, you can process the payment online by following the link below (Visa/MasterCard accepted only), and using the reference code ____(LASTNAME DATEOFFUNCTION)____ making sure to specify Nick’s Seafood in Cockle Bay.
>
> Minimum deposit is $25 (AUS) per person
>
>
>
> https://www.nicks-seafood.com.au/deposits <https://www.nicks-seafood.com.au/deposits>
>
>
>
>
> Once deposit is received Stephanie will confirm your reservation and final details. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need anything else.
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> SET MENU 3 3COURSE $85PP + 2HOUR HOUSE BEVERAGE PACKAGE $30PP
>
>
>
> ON ARRIVAL
>
> DINNER ROLL
>
>
>
> ENTRÉE – ALTERNATE SERVE
>
> COLD SEAFOOD SELECTION GF
>
> Freshly shucked Sydney rock oysters (substitute the oysters), fresh king prawns, tasmanian smoked salmon & marinated octopus (substitute the octopus)
>
>
>
> ALASKAN KING CRAB SALAD GF DF
>
> Served with mango, avocado & a lime vinaigrette
>
>
>
> SWEET POTATO & PROVOLONE RAVIOLI v
>
> Served with wilted baby spinach & pernod cream
>
>
>
> MAIN COURSE – ALTERNATE SERVE
>
> WHOLE BABY LOBSTER
>
> Served with a mornay sauce & a baby Greek salad
>
>
>
> I’M ANGUS SCOTCH FILLET & SCAMPI
>
> Served with shoestring fries & a red wine jus
>
>
>
> WILD MUSHROOM RISOTTO V
>
> Served with swiss brown, shitake, button mushrooms, parmesan & truffle oil
>
>
>
> All mains are served with mixed leaf salads & chips to share
>
>
>
> DESSERT – ALTERNATE SERVE
>
> EXOTIC SENSATION
>
> Coconut mousse, exotic cremeux, banana sponge, fresh fruit, pistachio praline & mango sorbet
>
>
>
> STICKY DATE PUDDING
>
> Served with butterscotch sauce & vanilla bean ice cream
>
>
>
> CRÈME BRULEE GF AVAILABLE
>
> Served with a chocolate & almond biscotti
>
>
>
>
>
> Selection of wines
>
> SPARKLING
>
> Cockle Bay Cuvee Brut
>
>
>
> WHITE WINE - Choice of 1 or 2 whites
>
> Nick’s Private Label Pinot Gris
>
> Nick’s Private Label Semillon Sauvignon Blanc
>
> Nick’s Private Label Chardonnay
>
>
>
> RED WINE - Choice of 1 red
>
> Nick’s Private Label Shiraz
>
> Nick’s Private Label Cabernet Merlot
>
>
>
> Selection of tap & bottled beers
>
> Great Northern Super Crisp Lager (On Tap)
>
> Pure Blonde (On Tap)
>
> Cascade Premium Light
>
> Pure Blonde Crisp Apple Cider
>
>
>
> Non alcoholic beverages
>
> Soft Drinks, Fruit Juices, Still & Sparkling Mineral Water
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Kind regards,
>
> Nia Gitsas-Group Sales Executive
